sentences.sentence: He needs to learn to curb his temper.
sentences.translation: 他得学着控制自己的脾气。

sentences.sentence: On the horizon we have the positive application of neurogastronomy; manipulating flavor to curb our appetites.
sentences.translation: 我们即将看到神经美食学的积极应用，即通过操控食物的味道来抑制我们的食欲。

sentences.sentence: It's easier to pick up apples than to drag tree branches all the way to the curb.
sentences.translation: 摘苹果比把树枝一直拖到路边要容易得多。
